programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A 21-year-old has crashed his motorbike into a telegraph pole and has serious leg and lung injuries. And a patient with paralysing locked-in syndrome is struggling to breathe after his breathing tube becomes dislodged.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: First to host in north Kent is clairvoyant and medium Yvette Tamara. The night gets off to a spooky start when data analyst John Tower and working mum Yemi Christopher-Soares discover a ghost busting machine.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Data analyst John Tower is second to host in north Kent. John has a passion for military re-enactment and barks orders at the table. However, not all of the guests are won over by Johns Filipino fatty pork stew and psychedelic dessert.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Project manager Yemi Christopher-Soares hopes her guests in north Kent will lap up her Nigerian-inspired menu and share her fondness for spice.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the penultimate night in north Kent and the turn of cocky Jono Simm, who is convinced his wholesome and hearty menu is a winner. Sadly two of his guests arent convinced by the cooking.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the final night in north Kent and the turn of cheeky party-loving Lisa Townend to be the host. Her menu is full of mysterious French fancies, including coq surprise, while her innovative entertainment is human roulette.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Charlotte and Matt host the second visit, at The Apple Farm in Warwickshire. Theyre hoping for a ringing endorsement for the plush bell tents at their glampsite, and the BandBers seem to have a good time getting to grips with a very unusual cow.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Penny and Russell want a holiday home near Spains seaside town of Mojácar, with a communal pool and just a short drive to the beach. Can Ben Hillman deliver their dream for £125k?

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Travelling from the Scottish countryside of New Lanark to Burnley, Fred talks to ex-weavers about life in the mills and meets a group of volunteers who have spent 30 years saving mill engines.

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: The railways stimulated great changes to the nations economy. They also changed the way we do business, encouraging a new generation of mechanical engineers, skilled workers, managers and accountants. Originally, local railway entrepreneurs viewed trains as vehicles for shifting raw materials, stock and goods. But soon they discovered there was money to be made in transporting people.

programme.title: The Two Ronnies Sketchbook
programme.desc: Barker and Corbett reunite to delve into the backstage stories behind some of their classic sketches.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Fletcher lands in hot water when some stolen pills accidentally find their way into his cup of tea.

programme.title: The Many Faces of...
programme.desc: A portrait of Ronnie Barker, a quiet dedicated actor who might have been a bank manager but went on to become one of the countrys favourite comedy stars. Ben Elton, Michael Grade, David Renwick and Josephine Tewson are among friends and colleagues who remember his genius. One half of the Two Ronnies and the likeable convict Fletcher in `Porridge, Ronnie was also a prolific writer and admired actor in serious roles.

programme.title: Storyville
programme.desc: On 7 October 2023, Liat Beinin Atzili and her husband Aviv are kidnapped from their kibbutz as part of the Hamas-led attack on Israel. This film begins by following her parents as they attempt to secure the release of their daughter.

programme.title: Success Story: Gore Vidal
programme.desc: In a programme first broadcast in 1975, Gore Vidal, the enfant terrible of American letters, then living in some splendour in Italy, talks about the ironies of succeeding so spectacularly in a world that he delights in attacking.

programme.title: Genius of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Bettany Hughes travels to China on the trail of Confucius, a great sage of Chinese history whose ideas have fundamentally shaped the country of his birth for around 2,500 years.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Mark Wright and his team, Karla Pryce and Asher Edwards, step in to help Glorias family, whose home was devastated by a flood. A year later, their living room is still a dumping ground, and the kitchen is chaotic. With clever decluttering, custom storage solutions and a vibrant feature wall, the team transform the house into a warm, functional space. From a playful coffee table to ingenious kitchen storage, they bring joy, style and order back to Glorias home.

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Best pals Amanda and Alan take on their first major renovation project, transforming the old dining room into a Tuscan living room. Failing to reach agreement on the colour scheme, the two venture off to try and get some inspiration from the colourful fishing village of Riomaggiore. Colour choice becomes the least of their worries though, when they discover the windows of their 17th-century home are unsalvageable and must be made from scratch.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson is in his element as he explores the glorious countryside of North and West Yorkshire with a couple from a market town in West Sussex. Jules has a superb selection of properties to show them, and key to their wish list is a big workshop where its hoped a woodworking hobby will become a profession.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Auctioneer JB and restorer Lauren scour a Birmingham home, unearthing global treasures and reviving worn pieces to make them auction-ready. By selling her late parents belongings, Ana hopes to fund her dream wedding.

programme.title: The Answer Run
programme.desc: Comedian Jason Manford hosts an exciting brand new fast-paced quiz show, where three couples face a series of 50/50 questions which hurtle The Answer Run down towards them.

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Angela Rippon. As always, contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else could think of.

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: Secret filming by Panorama reveals evidence of racism, misogyny, and officers revelling in the use of force at one of Londons busiest police stations, Charing Cross. After the murder of Sarah Everard by a serving police officer the Metropolitan Police promised change and says that since 2022 more than 1,400 officers have either been dismissed or have resigned following a clamp down on what it calls "rogue officers".

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: The young King Henry VIII struggles with his boring dad Henry VII, before becoming king himself, and going through wives like most people go through toothbrushes! Meanwhile across the world we meet the great Ottoman leader Suleiman the Magnificent in Turkey.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Egyptian queen Cleopatra clashes with her brother, seizes power, and hooks up with great Roman leaders Julius Caesar and Mark Anthony. Meanwhile, across the world we catch up with the thoughts of famous Chinese philosopher Confucius, and encounter the less glamorous side of life in Rome.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The cars put to the test include the Aston Martin Rapide, the Porsche Panamera Turbo and the Maserati Quattroporte, in a search for the worlds greatest four seat supercar. Richard is also on the test track the Chevrolet Camaro SS and Mercedes E63 AMG. Theres a double dose of celebrity as `Harry Potter star Rupert Grint and F1 ace Rubens Barrichello take their turns as the stars in the Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy retraces Sarms last known movements before her disappearance from a charter yacht in 2021. She hears Sarms boyfriend, Ryan Bane, give his account of what happened through his lawyer.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir searches for the yacht Sarm vanished from and tracks down Ryan Banes ex-wife, hearing first-hand about her experiences while married to him.

programme.title: People Just Do Nothing: Big in Japan
programme.desc: Since the end of their pirate radio station, life has been quiet for the Kurupt FM boys, but everything is about to change. News reaches them that one of their songs has been used on a popular game show in Japan. Theyve made it. Their music is reaching hundreds of thousands of people. Its finally time for them to enjoy the fame and fortune that theyve always known they deserved.

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: Mama Ru is back with a hot new cast of drag queens ready to do battle for the crown! Over the next ten weeks, the queens compete in a range of spicy challenges designed to test their drag mettle as they bid for the coveted title of the UKs Next Drag Race Superstar. In this premiere episode, the nervous energy is palpable as 12 brand new queens enter the werk room to meet their fellow competitors and judge supremo, RuPaul, for the very first time.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The cars put to the test include the Aston Martin Rapide, the Porsche Panamera Turbo and the Maserati Quattroporte, in a search for the worlds greatest four seat supercar. Richard is also on the test track the Chevrolet Camaro SS and Mercedes E63 AMG. Theres a double dose of celebrity as `Harry Potter star Rupert Grint and F1 ace Rubens Barrichello take their turns as the stars in the Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy doesnt want to see Jamma anymore, so when Jamma meets a magical stranger who offers to unburden him from his clownish ways to win Guy back, he decides to take the deal and is transformed. Guy has a photoshoot for his book cover, but he doesnt want to look boring, so Isaac offers to style him in exchange for free therapy.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The new Jamma is reliable and consistent - he wants to respect Guys boundaries, but he also needs Saifs address from Guy so that he can try and reconnect with his dad. Guy is pleasantly surprised by the new and improved Jamma. Winnies dad is visiting for some quality father-daughter bonding, but shes not yet come out as straight to him and asks Isaac to play along.

programme.title: Laugh Lessons
programme.desc: Larger than life and fun loving TikTok star Akafi battles with his insecure inner voice thats hellbent on destroying his self-confidence as he gets ready for a date.

programme.title: Bad Influencer: The Great Insta Con
programme.desc: The shocking story of the rise and fall of one of Instagrams first super-influencers. By 23, Australian wellness guru Belle Gibson had cultivated an adoring global following online with the story that she had successfully treated her own terminal cancer by eating a plant-based diet and using alternative natural therapies. But there was one problem with Belles story: she had never had cancer.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Dave and Si explore how Britains love affair with takeaway food has evolved and cook some of their favourites in the `Best of British kitchen.

programme.title: Wild West: Americas Great Frontier
programme.desc: Americas High Country is the land of grizzly bears and giant trees, of frigid winters and scorching summers, of tough ranchers and gold-rush fever. From the Rockies to the Sierra Nevada, survival demands endurance and know-how. From parasitic plants to thieving black bears, tenacious pikas and battling bison, its in the High Country that the west gets really wild.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin is at the Watts Gallery in the heart of the Surrey countryside with experts David Harper and Thomas Plant. David uncovers a collection of British film and TV memorabilia and Thomas is thrilled by some French cameo glass. Also, Paul Martin is on the trail of martians in Woking: the setting for HG Wellss sci-fi novel `The War Of The Worlds.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Melanie Bracewell, Ruth Madeley, Jenny Powell and Mark Steel test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Fleur East dishes up some more unmissable backstage gossip and behind-the-scenes action from the world of Strictly as the couples prepare for their next dances. And Choreography Corner looks back at more of the weekends performances.

programme.title: Nigella: At My Table
programme.desc: Nigella rustles up her wonderfully simple light waffles. She shares her favourites for entertaining friends, beef and aubergine fatteh, accompanied by bulgar wheat with flaked almonds and nigella seeds, followed by passion fruit ice-cream cake.

programme.title: Chronicles of the Sperrins
programme.desc: Its summer in the mountains. While some honour traditions like Cairn Sunday and village sport in Donemana, others seek out the wilder places, in search of natures mysteries.

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Prof Alice Roberts follows a year of British archaeology, joining up the results of digs.

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig looks at all things shaky and shady with Alan Davies, Eshaan Akbar, John Barrowman and Victoria Coren Mitchell.

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: The hilarious Paul Chowdhry introduces comedians Ania Magliano and Ian Smith to the stage.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Rob and Rylans Passage to India
programme.desc: Rob and Rylan are on the final leg of their Indian adventure. They discover an erotic temple, try mud wrestling for spiritual growth and go barefoot through Varanasi, Indias holiest city.

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: The honeymooners are elated as boats bring their friends and family from the other side of the world, but will their loved ones approve of their new partners? And while double dates deliver some home truths, one couple decide to wave goodbye to their stranded dream forever.

programme.title: Stacey and Joe
programme.desc: Stacey and Joe trade school runs for ski runs in a snowy family adventure, but Joes big romantic surprise quickly melts into laughter when it goes wrong.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Finals week on MasterChef has arrived! Seven weeks of intense competition has seen some extraordinary competitors fall by the wayside, and now just four are left standing.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Finals week continues, and the final four get the chance to take part in one of the most exciting Chefs Tables in MasterChef history.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: Bringing forensic journalism from all corners of the world by BBC Eye, the World Services critically acclaimed investigative unit, and featuring expert global correspondents getting to the heart of the biggest international stories.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Two young brothers introduce us to bocking and two ladies share their passions for high-speed motorcycling, frog breeding and knitted vegetables. Joining in the fun and games are antiques experts Kate Bliss and Christina Trevanion.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.sub-title: Well Worth the Wait in Cornwall
programme.desc: An old Sunday School in Cornwall undergoes a heavenly transformation. Two other unique properties in Hampshire and Lancashire are up for auction with interesting plans afoot.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Experts Margie Cooper and Ishy Khan are joined by 90s Gladiators Diane Jet Youdale and James Hunter Crossley. Squeezed into a classic Fiat 500, they shop around Lancashire.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Bridge of Lies
programme.desc: Ross Kemp presents as a team of four family members, Lisa, Claire, Mark and Jack, take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one they all face the bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Today, Hannah, John, Helen and Vince battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Four chefs compete for Northern Ireland with canapes, starters and fish dishes inspired by the Olympics and Paralympics, all hoping to cook at a banquet to wish Team GB athletes luck as they head for Paris 2024.

programme.title: Wild West: Americas Great Frontier
programme.desc: From the mysterious Sea of Cortez to the wild and elemental Pacific Ocean, powerful earth forces shape the coastline of the Wild West. These restless shores are a magnet for life; visited by the greatest of all animals, the blue whale, and by strange fish that come ashore on the full moon to spawn in their thousands.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: The team are in Huddersfield in West Yorkshire, and experts Mark Stacey and Christina Trevanion are on hand to find a selection of objects to take to auction. A beautifully crafted clock catches Christinas eye, while Mark is drawn to an unusual piece of Lalique glass. Meanwhile, Paul Martin pays a visit to Nostell Priory, a grand house that reveals a perfect marriage between Georgian architecture and craftsmanship.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Melanie Bracewell, Ruth Madeley, Jenny Powell and Mark Steel test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara has an exciting guide through all the backstage ballroom action, with more couples stopping by for a chat. And dont miss an exclusive first look at how some of the celebrities are handling their new dances.

programme.title: SOS: Extreme Rescues
programme.desc: New recruits are put to the test rescuing an injured climber, search dog Barneys on the hunt for a missing person, and a 13-year-old schoolgirl dislocates her knee in a gorge.

programme.title: Grand Tours of Scotlands Rivers
programme.desc: Paul explores the River Oykel in Sutherland from its source in Assynt to the Dornoch Firth and the sea. He learns about the loneliest and highest war grave in Scotland, tries for trout in a lochan, and then hears about the Year of the Sheep.

programme.title: Disclosure
programme.desc: Examining the issues affecting the lives of people around Scotland.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels across the Kalahari in Southern Africa. Along the way, Simon tracks wildebeest with a group of one of the regions indigenous inhabitants, the San, who are renowned for their hunting and tracking techniques.

programme.title: Inside No. 9
programme.desc: Beattie and Sam are a young couple finally on the property ladder, but the only flat they can afford has a dark and sinister past, a past that demands to be heard.

programme.title: BBC Weather

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat. Some animals eat slowly like cows, who eat all day long. But others eat quickly like frogs. Some, like goats, are always eating, while tortoises can go a whole year without food. Some animals eat food that is very high up, like giraffes, and some eat food that is very low down, like moles.

programme.title: Hey Duggees Squirrel Club
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits Theatre, its the speedy dancing runner beans, who wont stand still for even one minute.

programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet some dholes. These are wild dogs that live across Asia, from China to Thailand, as well as in the dense forests of India. Next, Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet dwarf mongooses. They can live in groups of up to 30 and are tiny.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?

Diesel is Rayanes ears. Together, theyre unstoppable! Rayane needs Diesels help to do his Sunday chores. But first, Rayane teaches Diesel a new command - find it. When Rayane squeaks his squeaker and makes the sign, Diesel has to find it. Diesel loves learning new commands!

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon travels to Pasadena, California to visit a Jamaican restaurant called Cafe Kingston. There, Gordon finds Dr Una Morris, a micro-managing owner who also works as a radiotherapist in a clinic next door to the restaurant. She is determined to use hospital techniques in her kitchen and is constantly sealing everything into plastic bags. Dr Morris is as stubborn as she is proud. Can Gordon help?

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the very best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to `Jurassic World: Dominion.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: Quiet teacher Will Gerard is sucked into a world of vigilantism when his wife Laura is brutally attacked.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: Quiet teacher Will Gerard is sucked into a world of vigilantism when his wife Laura is brutally attacked.

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: Quiet teacher Will Gerard is sucked into a world of vigilantism when his wife Laura is brutally attacked.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: Young DJ and his pals set out to discover what bloodcurdling secrets lie behind the front door of the scary house across the street. When the house comes alive and starts eating people, have the kids bitten off more than they can chew?

programme.title: The Inventor
programme.desc: The insatiably curious Leonardo da Vinci leaves Italy to join the French court, where he can experiment freely, invent incredible machines and study the human body. He is joined on his adventure by the audacious French princess Marguerite de Nevarre.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: Three emojis embark on an epic adventure through a smartphone to save their world from being deleted.

programme.title: The Rugrats Movie
programme.desc: Tommy and his plucky pals go on a forest adventure in his fathers latest invention, the Reptar Wagon.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a group of Allied POWs who engineered a bold escape from a Nazi camp during World War II. The escape committees plan is to liberate hundreds of inmates and cause havoc throughout occupied territory, but their problems include concealing three tunnels from the guards and disposing of numerous tons of soil.

programme.title: Aporia
programme.desc: When a former physicist reveals that hes been building a time-bending machine that could restore her former life, a grieving woman soon faces an impossible choice and unforeseeable consequences.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: The Young Messiah
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Jesus starts to discover his miraculous powers while travelling with Mary and Joseph to Nazareth.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Paul Blart takes his teenage daughter with him to Las Vegas for a security-guard expo. While there, he stumbles upon a heist and must single-handedly apprehend the crooks.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Favourites
programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from Monster Family to The Amazing Maurice.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A group of talking dogs save the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Volcanologist Trevor Anderson journeys into the Earths core after discovering evidence that the famous authors story was based on fact. Accompanied by his teenage nephew Sean and fellow scientist Hannah, Trevor is soon coming face-to-face with an astonishing and extremely perilous hidden world.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: A teen and his new stepfather find an island of secrets, strange life forms and gold after they answer a coded distress signal.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: When Mary Lennoxs parents suddenly die, she is sent to live with her uncle, Archibald Craven, on his remote country estate deep in the Yorkshire moors. While exploring, she discovers a hidden magical garden.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A group of talking dogs save the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: Ride On

programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Paul Blart takes his teenage daughter with him to Las Vegas for a security-guard expo. While there, he stumbles upon a heist and must single-handedly apprehend the crooks.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Favourites
programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from Monster Family to The Amazing Maurice.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A group of talking dogs save the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Volcanologist Trevor Anderson journeys into the Earths core after discovering evidence that the famous authors story was based on fact. Accompanied by his teenage nephew Sean and fellow scientist Hannah, Trevor is soon coming face-to-face with an astonishing and extremely perilous hidden world.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: A teen and his new stepfather find an island of secrets, strange life forms and gold after they answer a coded distress signal.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: When Mary Lennoxs parents suddenly die, she is sent to live with her uncle, Archibald Craven, on his remote country estate deep in the Yorkshire moors. While exploring, she discovers a hidden magical garden.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two high-school nerds accidentally create the woman of their dreams when an electrical storm zaps their home computer.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: The Big Chill
programme.desc: Reunited at a funeral, several college friends look back at how their lives have changed since the turbulent 1960s.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two sorry siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A bankrupt screenwriter is drawn into the decaying, unstable world of a forgotten silent movie star. Oscar-winning satire of Hollywoods move to talking pictures with stand-out performances from Swanson and von Stroheim.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two sorry siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations
programme.desc: A New York executive down on his luck finds out hes been left $150,000 by his aunt Sally. Returning to his hometown in Georgia, he discovers theres a catch - he has to create a gospel choir capable of winning the Gospel Explosion competition. Recruiting the towns one decent singer, he assembles a mish-mash of singers, including local convicts, and sets about getting them into shape.

programme.title: The Birds
programme.desc: Socialite Melanie follows a handsome lawyer back to his coastal home. She is menaced by birds on the road and has to take cover as the aerial attacks intensify. Based on Daphne du Mauriers story.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black

programme.title: The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death
programme.desc: 40 years after Eel Marsh Houses first haunting, a group of children and a schoolteacher take refuge at the house, escaping from WWII London. There they will awaken the houses darkest inhabitant.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Competing teams of storm chasers find themselves in a fight for their lives as multiple systems converge over central Oklahoma.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A car crash leaves a playboy maimed and charged with murder in this remake of the mind-bending film `Abre los Ojos.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: Chicago teen Ren and his family move to the small midwestern town of Bomont, where rock music has been banned.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.title: Manodrome
programme.desc: Tormented by personal demons, Ralphie encounters a mysterious organization of men who welcome him as one of their own. As he struggles to define himself, pressure mounts and a powder keg is lit as he blows a hole in the lives of everyone he touches.

programme.title: The Civil War
programme.desc: 1862 saw the birth of modern warfare and the transformation of what had been Lincolns war to preserve the Union into a war to emancipate the slaves. programme.desc: While forensic evidence suggests the prime suspects for the bombing of Pan Am 103 are a Palestinian terror group funded by Iran, Scottish and FBI investigators are eventually led elsewhere.

programme.sub-title: The Story of Zed The Hero of Africa
programme.desc: The volcano is threatening to erupt but the animals are reluctant to leave their beautiful savannah home. Can anybody come to the rescue?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the End of the Rainy Season
programme.desc: It is the end of the rainy season and Patsy the porcupine will soon be arriving to tidy up the savannah. The animals are busy having a clearout, except for Herbert the warthog who cannot bring himself to throw anything away. When he cannot find his musical rocks for the concert that night he is encouraged by Doris the duck to have a clearout.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Flamingo Festival
programme.desc: Pauline the pelican is looking forward to the Flamingo Festival on Waterlily Lake and excited to hear that Isobel is this years Flamingo Queen. She loves to watch the flamingoes practising their dance, and secretly copies their moves. When Isobel hurts herself, everybody is worried that the Flamingo Festival will have to be cancelled. That is, until a surprising understudy steps in to take Isobels place.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Whale Trip
programme.desc: The puffins of Mossy Bay are excited to be going on a whale trip with Hercule Moustache. Hercule points out all manner of sights and sounds as they ride on Thelma the whale, but the boisterous puffins dont always listen to Hercule, and frequently interrupt the poor walrus. The puffins soon learn how important it is to listen to your elders when out on a trip.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Jimjameree Tree
programme.desc: Joey the kangaroo and his friends all love to play by the jimjamaree tree. They are devastated when the tree is struck by lightning in a big storm. Together with Wally Two Trees they do everything they can to ensure their favourite tree comes back to life, with magical results.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.desc: Joey the kangaroo and his friend love playing boomerang ball together. However when their mums fall out they are no longer allowed to play with each other. Can the friends work together to reconcile their mums so that they can play again?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Zeds Really Helpful Mood

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and Mr Burns go on the run to Cuba with a trillion-dollar note that Mr Burns stole from the government many years ago.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: A freak accident causes Michael to think the office is cursed; Michael decides to hold a charity 5K fun run; further developments in co-workers romances.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Much to the dismay of Michael and many of the employees, Ryan returns to the Scranton branch of Dunder Mifflin to bring the company into the digital age. Angela is still upset about her cat.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa signs up to be coach of Barts baseball team. Siblings and sport dont mix, however, and the pair spend more time bickering than playing ball.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Lisa Simpson, This Isnt Your Life
programme.desc: As was the case with Marge before her, Lisa fears that her academia will suffer due to distraction. Meanwhile, Bart claims the title of `School Bully after putting Nelson in his place.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Global Adventure: The Rise of Nature
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores the rise of life on our planet, from the explosion of first life on seabeds hundreds of millions of years ago to life today.

programme.desc: In Arizona, Romesh faces the intense world of sales. Then, he heads to a paid prison retreat in South Korea before working as a delivery driver in Mumbai.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

programme.desc: Following the exploits of Vinnie, a Lancashire lad with bipolar disorder, and Dylan, his razor-smart best mate. Inseparable and utterly co-dependant, these boys have hardly spent a day apart since birth.

programme.title: Peacemaker
programme.desc: Chris `Peacemaker Smith is a mercenary who believes he is pursuing freedom and peace when he is really just killing people. What makes him who he is? How was his life? Who are his friends?

programme.desc: In a dramatic edition, Tristan tries to stop a young lad from injuring himself, Plus, Jim and Lloydy confront a driver who refuses to pass over her correct details.

programme.sub-title: How Munched Is That Birdie in the Window?

programme.desc: When a crew of violent eco-terrorists abducts the teenage son of an energy company executive, the team must untangle the kidnappers twisted motives before carrying out a high-stakes rescue mission; Hondos involvement in a shooting draws outrage.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Following an incident involving recycling responsibilities and a bit of bribery, Homer goes undercover to bring down Fat Tony.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: This customary Halloween episode features three spine-tingling tales. `War and Pieces sees Bart and Milhouse swap the joys of videogaming for the original delights of the board game, `Tweenlight focuses on Lisas infatuation with a fellow student/vampire and `Master and Cadaver sees Homer and Marge at sea on their second honeymoon.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart discovers that a fifth grade dodgeballer has the same mysterious scar on his hand. Marge explains that seven years ago, she and her girlfriends formed a group called the `The Cool Moms - Bart belonging to one of them.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year

programme.title: Big Little Lies

programme.title: Big Little Lies

programme.title: An Idiot Abroad

programme.title: The Force: Manchester

programme.desc: In 2024/25, AFC Bournemouth smashed their club record with 56 Premier League points, but less than 20 years earlier, they were drowning in debt and fighting for survival. programme.sub-title: Vicious Pit Bull Attack?!; Six-Year-Old Takes the Stand!
programme.desc: Two dogs are accused of dragging their owner across the street to viciously attack another dog. A child testifies that a 55-inch TV was damaged by friends, and his mother says a mattress, carpet, and pregnancy pillow were also destroyed.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: House Flipping and Assault!?; Mechanic Fraud?!
programme.desc: A friendship comes to an end when a home renovation deal escalates into accusations of assault. Parents sue their mechanic for fraud when a car stop running.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Walter Notheis Jr was the lead singer of Bob Kugan And The In Men, who had hits in the 60s. He disappeared in 1983 and was found dead in 1987. How did he meet his maker?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a man confessed to the rape and murder of a woman at a pizza restaurant, police thought the case was closed. Until eight years later when another man confessed.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Murder UK With Martin Kemp
programme.desc: Martin Kemp examines the case of Frederick and Rosemary West, a married couple who killed at least ten young British girls, many at their home in Gloucestershire.

programme.title: Morbidelli Rising
programme.desc: Theres danger on the track at the years biggest race, Mugello. Franco battles to focus on his goal of Rookie of the Year while around him his team implodes.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: 48 Hours goes behind the scenes with investigators as they search for a mother of two who vanished just before Hurricane Harvey hit. Correspondent Maureen Maher investigates.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A mother and daughter vanish whilst out shopping. When the girl turns up dead, the mother is the initial suspect, but who really killed her?

programme.title: Murder UK
programme.desc: Hollie Gazzard, a young hairdresser from the UK, was hoping for a fresh start but was tragically killed by her ex, leaving her family and community devastated.

programme.title: Murder UK
programme.desc: Years after David Clarkes death, a confession tape reveals a betrayal between feuding neighbours in the UK.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Was an Atlanta detectives investigation into an alleged rape and shooting death case influenced by TV cameras? Erin Moriarty investigates.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A young prostitute is found dead in an Ohio waterway. Authorities face huge challenges to find the killer, with DNA evidence washed away and her policeman clients.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In a small South Carolina town in 1991, 17-year-old Crystal Faye Todd, a popular high school student, was raped, murdered and dumped in a deserted field. With few leads, authorities DNA tested several friends and the match was a shock to all.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A woman vanished from her home on Prince Edward Island. Her abandoned car was found in a field; inside, the windows were spattered with blood. During the search for her body, police found a plastic bag containing a sneakers and a leather jacket.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In 1984, hundreds of people in Oregon became ill with food poisoning. Detectives tracked down the outbreak to a cult which aimed to use germ warfare to take down the government.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A tattoo artist mouths off to his ex-girlfriend in court, denying he owes $8,000 for a motorcycle.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Teen Child Support Woes!; Baby Car Seat Slip-Up!
programme.desc: A man sues his unemployed ex for her share of their childs extracurricular activities and orthodontic bills; a mother puts her toddler in the wrong kind of car seat, causing her friend to get a ticket.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Innocent Onlooker Steps Up!; Officer Byrd Nudged by a 13-Year-Old!
programme.desc: An eyewitness tells of a car crash; a teen demonstrates how he pushed another child on the playground.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Hostile Work Environment?; Trampoline Park Accident!
programme.desc: A homeless couple accuse a former friend of cheating them out of pay and harassing them on the job; a teen accidentally stabs a co-workers phone with a pen.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Jealousy-Fueled Vandalism?!; Fire Pit Craziness?! Bitten Buyer?!
programme.desc: A mans girlfriend accuses him of repeatedly kicking her car; a landlady discovers a fire pit on her property; an Australian terrier accused of biting a man.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Most Wanted Shoplifter?!; The Reluctant Landlord?
programme.desc: A stores customer becomes shocked to see a photo of himself portrayed as a shoplifter; a landlady sues a tenant for harassment.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman sues contractors for shoddy workmanship; they say she held their tools hostage and extorted money from them.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Jail Bailout Blues; Rare Disease? Financial Disaster!
programme.desc: A man cannot repay his loan on time after he falls on hard times due to his wifes illness. Plus, a family friend rescues a young man and lets him move in with them and then sues him when he doesnt pay her back.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Which Driver Is Lying?!; Hauling Business Fail!
programme.desc: When motorists offer up wildly different collision stories, the timing of their damage claims makes all the difference. A man claims he grossed $200,000 but was still unable to pay for the truck and trailer he bought from a former friend.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A mans troubled relationship with his 16-year-old motorcycle ends with a lawsuit, when what he views as shoddy repairs leave him stranded.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A divorced couple spend thousands of dollars to get the best possible lawyer for their child, then argue over who owes for the costly decision.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Murder, Prison and Conjugal Visits; Dont Let the Bedbugs Bite!

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: A Womans Dying Wishes; Subwoofer Custody Battle!

programme.desc: Compo and Clegg are not as fit as they need to be, according to Foggy, but Clegg has a sneaking suspicion that some of the worlds nicest people are those with tired, flagging limbs.

programme.title: Iqbal
programme.desc: Iqbal is a young man born deaf and dumb into a Muslim family in rural India. Just like many of Indias young hopefuls obsessed with the national sport, Iqbals secret dream is to play cricket for his country. However, his father is set against it. Through the help of his resourceful, feisty sister, Iqbal at last finds a coach and mentor: alcoholic ex-cricket star Mohit.

programme.title: Rashmi Rocket
programme.desc: The inspiring story of a small-town girl, who overcomes all societal barriers to become a national-level athlete, but her glory is hindered when she is asked to undergo a gender test. Watch the Taapsee Pannu starrer Rashmi Rocket.

programme.title: Udta Punjab
